# OpInterface definitions
## AsyncLayerOpInterface (`VPUIP_AsyncLayerOpInterface`)

Interface for layers that will be executed asynchronously in separate Executor
### Methods:
#### `getExecutor`

```c++
vpux::IndexedSymbolAttr getExecutor();
```
Get Executor for the asynchronous launch
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

## DMATypeOpInterface (`VPUIP_DMATypeOpInterface`)

Interface for DMA type layers
### Methods:
#### `setDmaHwpIdAttr`

```c++
void setDmaHwpIdAttr(mlir::IntegerAttr dmaIdAttr);
```
Sets DMA hardware profiling id
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getDmaHwpIdAttr`

```c++
mlir::IntegerAttr getDmaHwpIdAttr();
```
Returns DMA hardware profiling id
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getPortAttribute`

```c++
mlir::IntegerAttr getPortAttribute();
```
Get DMA port attr
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getPortVal`

```c++
int64_t getPortVal();
```
Get DMA port value
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `setPortAttribute`

```c++
void setPortAttribute(mlir::IntegerAttr portAttr);
```
Set DMA port attr
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getChannelTypeAttr`

```c++
VPUIP::DmaChannelTypeAttr getChannelTypeAttr();
```
Get DMA channel attr
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getChannelType`

```c++
::llvm::Optional<VPUIP::DmaChannelType> getChannelType();
```
Get DMA channel value
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `setChannelTypeAttr`

```c++
void setChannelTypeAttr(VPUIP::DmaChannelTypeAttr channelTypeAttr);
```
Set DMA channel attr
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getInput`

```c++
mlir::Value getInput();
```
Get DMA input value
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

## LayerOpInterface (`VPUIP_LayerOpInterface`)

Base interface for VPUIP Layer Operation
### Methods:
#### `getInputs`

```c++
mlir::OperandRange getInputs();
```
Get all layer input memory buffers
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getOutputs`

```c++
mlir::OperandRange getOutputs();
```
Get all layer output memory buffers
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getOpOperands`

```c++
llvm::detail::concat_range<mlir::OpOperand, llvm::MutableArrayRef<mlir::OpOperand>, llvm::MutableArrayRef<mlir::OpOperand>> getOpOperands();
```
Get all layer memory buffers
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getInOpOperands`

```c++
llvm::MutableArrayRef<mlir::OpOperand> getInOpOperands();
```
Get all layer input memory buffers
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getOutOpOperands`

```c++
llvm::MutableArrayRef<mlir::OpOperand> getOutOpOperands();
```
Get all layer output memory buffers
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

## SoftwareLayerOpInterface (`VPUIP_SoftwareLayerOpInterface`)

Interface for layers that will be executed on SHAVEs. (For VPUX37XX only)
### Methods:
#### `getKernelInfo`

```c++
vpux::VPUIP::KernelInfo getKernelInfo();
```
Get information about kernel's arguments, entry point and etc.
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

## TaskOpInterface (`VPUIP_TaskOpInterface`)

Interface for VPUIP Task
### Methods:
#### `serialize`

```c++
vpux::VPUIP::BlobWriter::SpecificTask serialize(vpux::VPUIP::BlobWriter&writer);
```
Serialize the Task to BLOB format
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getExecutorKind`

```c++
static vpux::VPU::ExecutorKind getExecutorKind();
```
Get the executor for the Operation
